titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the week of December 19, 2005 should be designated "Thank Our Defenders Week."
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the week of December 19, 2005 should be designated "Thank Our Defenders Week."

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the sense of the Senate that the week of December 19, 2005, should be designated "Thank Our Defenders Week."
